page.title: 01THE TOWN OF TILBURY
page.content: Tilbury is a town on the north side of the River Thames.The population of Tilbury is about 33,524. Tilbury gets most of its jobs and money from the power station and the docks.It is built on marshy ground which means there are still some uncovered areas of marsh.There are quite a few house building schemes which are still under construction There is a railway station on the edge of town. In the town there are assorted shops,schools ,leisure centre facilities and emergency services. Also near the sea wall there is a ferry dock platform. Next to the ferry docking platform there is a place where large ships can deliver there cargo.
